definitions.body: :Ex 6:6 judgement;—pl. [[שְׁפָטִים]] Ex 6:6 +, sf. [[שְׁפָטַי]] Ez Eze 14:21;—acts of judgment (cf. [[משׁפטים]]), [[בשׁפטים גדלים]] by great acts of judgment Ex 6:6, Ex 7:4 (P); c. [[בְּ]], [[עשׂה שׁפטים]] Ex 12:12, Nu 33:4 (P), Ez Eze 5:10, Eze 5:15, Eze 11:9, Eze 16:41, Eze 25:11, Eze 28:22, Eze 28:26, Eze 30:14, Eze 30:19 (all of God); men Ez Eze 16:41; c. [[את]], 2Ch 24:24 (Syrians against Joash); [[שׁפטים]] of God (four: sword, famine, wild beasts, pestilence) Ez Eze 14:21; [[ללחים]] ´[[נכונו שׁ]]: Pr 19:29 judgments are prepared for scorners (LXX [[שְׁבָטִים]] rods, so Perles:Anal. 69 [or [[שׁוֹטִים]]], Toy).
